attributes.action: Force Philip Morris to start selling the Tobaccoless Cigarette
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: During the late 70's and Early 80's the Philip Morris tobacco company invented a tobaccoless cigarette but then quickly dropped it.  No reason has ever been given and this type of advance could have already saved thousands of life's.  I would like to see the government demanding to know why this advance has been held back along with a demand to know why they did not pursue it!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
